title: U.S. Open Surprises: Stars Djokovic And Federer Out
teaser: Surprising upsets at the U.S. Open on Saturday when both two top players were eliminated. NPR's Lynn Neary talks with Mike Pesca of Slate.com about that and the upcoming NFL season.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
